name: Pumpkin Spice Breakfast Cookies
description: Cookies for breakfast anyone? These vegan pumpkin spice breakfast cookies with cranberries are not only super delicious but also packed with nutrients!
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons popped amaranth (You can also sub it with almond meal.)

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the flax seeds in 4 teaspoons of water for about 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the flax seeds in 4 teaspoons of water for about 3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients except the pumpkin seeds. Stir in the soaked flax seeds.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients except the pumpkin seeds. Stir in the soaked flax seeds.

recipeInstructions.text: Form 6 to 8 cookies and line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Sprinkle the cookies with the pumpkin seeds.
recipeInstructions.name: Form 6 to 8 cookies and line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Sprinkle the cookies with the pumpkin seeds.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 350 degrees F for 20-25 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 350 degrees F for 20-25 minutes.
